name: IBM WebSphere Network Deployment 8.5.5 cell with IBM HTTP Server - IBM
description: This template deploys a WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment 8.5.5 cell with an integrated IBM HTTP Server.

metadata.longDescription: This template deploys a WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment 8.5.5 cell with an integrated IBM HTTP Server.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
• Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
  • Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
• Virtual Machine 1: WebSphere Deployment Manager
  • Virtual Machine 2: WebSphere Custom Node, one cluster member
  • Virtual Machine 3: WebSphere Custom Node, one cluster member
  • Virtual Machine 4: IBM HTTP Server and web server plug-in for WAS configured

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
• IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment 8.5.5
  • IBM HTTP Server for WebSphere Application Server 8.5.5
  • Web Server Plug-ins for IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5.5
  • IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 8

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. Detailed system requirements for WAS ND 8.5.5 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
  3. IBM Knowledge Center for WAS ND 8.5.5 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSAW57_8.5.5
  4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
